Traits.Name: Digital Evasion
Traits.Content: Crungus has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that deal damage from spells or magical effects.

Traits.Name: Cryptid Presence
Traits.Content: The mere sight of Crungus can invoke a sense of dread. Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of Crungus must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Claw Swipe
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 21 (5d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Cryptid Howl
Actions.Content: Crungus emits a terrifying howl that resonates with the fear associated with its existence. Each creature of Crungus's choice within 30 feet must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On failure, a creature takes 30 (4d12 + 4) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On success, it takes half damage and is not stunned. This ability recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.
